alert.note: Alert for Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 4:19PM CDT until August 29 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Grady County in central Oklahoma... West central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 418 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchard, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newcastle, Blanchard, Goldsby, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Middleberg and Criner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
